content.text:
# List of presidents of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints__disambig_2

__NOTOC__
This article lists the presidents of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (LDS Church). Each of the included persons has served as president and been considered the prophet, seer, and revelator of the LDS Church.

Timeline
TimeAxis = orientation:horizontal format:yyyy
Legend = orientation:vertical position:bottom columns:4
Colors =
id:life   value:blue   legend:Lifespan
id:pres   value:orange legend:Tenure
id:apos   value:green    legend:Pre-Presidential-Apostleship
id:bar    value:gray(0.95)
id:darkgray   value:gray(0.60)
id:lightgray  value:gray(0.80)
ScaleMajor = increment:10 start:1800 gridcolor:darkgray
ScaleMinor = increment:5 start:1800 gridcolor:lightgray
BackgroundColors = bars:bar
BarData =
bar:JS text:Joseph Smith
bar:BY text:Brigham Young
bar:JT text:John Taylor
bar:WW text:Wilford Woodruff
bar:LS text:Lorenzo Snow
bar:JFS text:Joseph F. Smith
bar:HJG text:Heber J. Grant
bar:GAS text:George Albert Smith
bar:DOM text:David O. McKay
bar:JFD text:Joseph Fielding Smith
bar:HBL text:Harold B. Lee
bar:SWK text:Spencer W. Kimball
bar:ETB text:Ezra Taft Benson
bar:HWH text:Howard W. Hunter
bar:GBH text:Gordon B. Hinckley
bar:TSM text:Thomas S. Monson
bar:RMN text:Russell M. Nelson
bar:DHO text:Dallin H. Oaks
